name: Stellar Labyrinth
description:
There exists a maze in the sky, where tiny suns shepherd tiny stars. Navigate this labyrinth, guiding the sun while walls collapse around you. Try to collect stars and keep your next path in view - once you can't see it, it's gone! You'll have tools to help, including bombs, lassos and teleporters. Can you decypher the Stellar Labyrinth?

Move with the arrow keys or WASD.
Aim a powerup tool with the mouse, and use it with left click.
Press space to increase screen zoom speed.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
